author: gbrown
msg: Fix minor issue in BXMLSerializer that prevented callers from using attributes to set properties on read-only bean properties.

author: damien
msg: Added comment why we use werl instead of erl by default. It's because of testing restarts that fail sometimes when using erl.

author: struberg
msg: OWB-369 also cleanup the ContextFactory when application is stopping

author: damien
msg: Fix for windows fsync, race conditions in attachments.js and the default shell used when launching windows CouchDB.
